properties.title: Launch analysis on Amazon Web service cloud
properties.author: Laurent Jourdren

section.name: Launch analysis on Amazon Web service cloud
section.p: This command launch Eoulsan on Amazon Web Services Cloud. The data is first upload on Amazon S3 storage before launching analysis is launched. To run Eoulsan on AWS, you must the AWS credentials in global parameters of your parameter file or in a configuration file.

ul.li:
Mandatory parameters:
ParameterValueDescription
parameter pathstringThe path to parameter file to use
design pathstringThe path path design file to use
data path on S3stringThe path where upload data on S3

Optional parameters:
ParameterValueDescription
-dstringThe description of the analysis

Usage:
$ eoulsan.sh awsexec -d 'my test' param.xml design.txt s3://my-bucket/test
